title: 383B.927 INTERGOVERNMENTAL TRANSFERS.
text: For purposes of medical assistance, Medicaid, Medicare, and other public programs, the corporation shall continue to be a "unit of state or local government" and a "government owned or operated hospital," and shall be eligible to receive "intergovernmental transfers" and "certified public expenditures" as may be authorized from time to time by the state of Minnesota or Hennepin County.
